description: This Java source file defines the `LegacySecurityDeviceInfoEvent` class, which extends `ClusterCommandEvent`. It models an event related to legacy security devices, particularly for creating a payload message with device information to be sent over Zigbee. The class includes constants for device info message lengths, manages a device object, and constructs a byte array payload representing device firmware, type, status, thresholds, and other configuration data.

classes.name: LegacySecurityDeviceInfoEvent
classes.description: Represents a Zigbee cluster command event specific to legacy security devices, capable of generating a device info payload with detailed firmware and configuration data.

methods.name: getCommandPayload
methods.description: Constructs and returns the byte array payload containing device firmware, type, status, thresholds, region, manufacturer ID, and model ID information.
